condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_HISTORYSTEP WHERE ENTRY_ID = ? AND STEP_ID = 83 AND ACTION_ID = 84",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID])>0

step.name: 内核办文管提交公司协同平台

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_QY_ZKLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,-1,$Login.User,'120000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_QY_ZKLC",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
  true;
}else{
  false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_QY_ZKLC') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 91 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_QY_ZKLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,92,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

step.name: 投资银行总部总部经理
内核办权益类团队负责人
